name: LD40 Chuck Norris will Make America Great Again
name_original: LD40 Chuck Norris will Make America Great Again
description:
In the near future, American citizens grew tired of the corruption and deceit that has plagued it's Country. Now America calls on one man, Chuck Norris. Only Chuck Norris can be trusted to clean up the Lies, Dirty Money, Missing Tax Returns and Classified files, and bring those guilty to Justice.

Look out, some of the World Leaders want to use this information to Bring America down. Chuck must take out those leaders and collect the stolen information.

Chuck Norris will --- "Make America Great Again"
